channel.title: Comments on: The Break Dancing Worm

item.description: you can download the whole song (with lyric) from here: http://www.4shared.com/file/1525043/6d2992cc/Afrika_Bambaataa_-_Looking_For_The_Perfect_Beat.html?s=1

item.title: By: Robert
item.dc:creator: Robert
item.description: I wish this commercial was like 10 minutes long. It is waaaay to short. It's great though.
item.content:encoded: I wish this commercial was like 10 minutes long. It is waaaay to short. It’s great though.

item.title: By: john
item.dc:creator: john
item.description: the name of the song is: LL COOL J ft. j-lo - control myself
item.content:encoded: the name of the song is: LL COOL J ft. j-lo – control myself

item.title: By: chileboy
item.dc:creator: chileboy
item.description: LL cool j's latest Control Myself uses the Perfect Beat as the backdrop! I have been trying to nail down that song - thanks!
item.content:encoded: LL cool j’s latest Control Myself uses the Perfect Beat as the backdrop! I have been trying to nail down that song – thanks!

item.title: By: cardiorrhexis
item.dc:creator: cardiorrhexis
item.description: OMG thank goodness for this thread!!!!!!!

item.title: By: Smee
item.dc:creator: Smee
item.description: Afrika Bambaataa Is the man.. Keep rocking, make those beats.
item.content:encoded: Afrika Bambaataa Is the man.. Keep rocking, make those beats.

item.title: By: John Smith
item.dc:creator: John Smith
item.description: What is the name of the song the worm breakdances to and how do i get it
item.content:encoded: What is the name of the song the worm breakdances to and how do i get it

item.title: By: Zeruan
item.dc:creator: Zeruan
item.description: The beat can also be found in Paul Wall - Holla At Me (mixed by DJ Kkaled).
item.content:encoded: The beat can also be found in Paul Wall – Holla At Me (mixed by DJ Kkaled).
